name: Synergy Flight Center
about: Synergy Flight Center, Illinois' only Cirrus Training Center, offers premier aviation services from two locations: Central Illinois Regional Airport (KBMI) in Bloomington and Chicago Executive Airport (KPWK) in Wheeling. Our expert instructors, trained by Cirrus, provide personalized flight training using state-of-the-art Cirrus SR20 and SR22 aircraft, as well as advanced simulators. We offer flexible courses tailored to individual needs, from earning a Private Pilot License to advanced training and recurrent training. Our membership options include reduced hourly rates, priority access to aircraft, and recurrent training. With a focus on customer trust, transparency, and professionalism, Synergy Flight Center is dedicated to providing outstanding aviation experiences. Whether you're a new pilot or a seasoned aviator, Synergy Flight Center is your gateway to the freedom of private flight.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
